name: The Runic Conjecture
description:
The Runic Conjecture is a magical puzzle game about experimenting and learning the meaning of mysterious runes. What may seem like Magic now is merely a Science that you have yet to understand.

Controls:  Arrow Keys to move, Letter Keys to enter runes, Backspace to delete runes, Enter to submit runes, Esc to pause

Made in 1 week for GameCraft! 2022.
Theme: Magic as a Science

Best played using Windows 10, in a Google Chrome browser, Fullscreen

Devlog https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TlDwX7Cl__yqGnOloYQJ7SNkTKNHxnogfH7_HojYAfs/edit?usp=drivesdk
